hero.title: Hope Bridge Association (HBA)
hero.subtitle: Since 2015, HBA has been changing lives ‚Äî building hope, dignity, and resilience

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.text1: Hope Bridge Association (HBA) is a Palestinian non-profit, non-governmental, and charitable organization licensed by the Ministry of Interior ‚Äì Ramallah under registration number GA-1123-C
whoWeAre.text2: Since 2015, HBA has been dedicated to providing humanitarian aid and development programs to vulnerable communities in the Gaza Strip, with a particular focus on marginalized and rural areas
whoWeAre.text3: We work tirelessly to support families living below the poverty line and facing severe humanitarian conditions, helping them restore dignity and build resilience
whoWeAre.text4: HBA is committed to empowering Palestinian society through planned, sustainable, and impactful programs, aiming to create a future where communities are self-reliant, productive, and resilient

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To deliver timely relief and sustainable development programs that support vulnerable and marginalized communities in Gaza, enabling them to live with dignity and hope

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: A resilient Palestinian society empowered with opportunities for sustainable growth, dignity, and prosperity

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.text: We uphold transparency, honesty, and accountability in everything we do

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.text: We partner with local and international stakeholders to maximize impact

impact.title: Impact
impact.text: We focus on creating measurable and life-changing results

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: We find creative solutions to address urgent humanitarian challenges

work.title: Our Work
work.intro: HBA‚Äôs programs are designed to address urgent humanitarian needs while fostering long-term community development. We focus on:

humanitarian.title: Humanitarian Assistance
humanitarian.text: Providing emergency relief such as food parcels, clean water, shelter, and winterization aid for displaced and vulnerable families

health.title: Health & Medical Support
health.text: Offering essential medicines, medical equipment, and mobile clinics to ensure access to healthcare services, especially during crises

education.title: Education & Child Protection
education.text: Supporting schools, learning centers, and psychosocial activities to protect children and empower youth affected by war and displacement

livelihood.title: Livelihood & Economic Development
livelihood.text: Implementing vocational training and income-generating projects to help families achieve financial independence

psychosocial.title: Psychosocial Support
psychosocial.text: Providing safe spaces and trauma-healing activities for children and families, promoting mental well-being and community resilience

efficiency.title: Financial Efficiency
efficiency.text: We ensure every donation is used effectively

community.title: Community-Centered Approach
community.text: We work closely with local communities to identify real needs

joinUs.title: Join Us ‚Äì Plant Hope, Change Lives
joinUs.text: Your support can save lives and restore dignity for families in Gaza ,Every contribution matters. With your help, we can provide food, medicine, clean water, education, and emergency shelter to those who need it most
